column3: School of Life and Health Sciences
column5: Looking to develop into an Advanced Clinical Practice (ACP) role? This multiprofessional programme will help you develop essential skills such as advanced health assessment, clinical decision making and patient management, enabling you to work across the integrated care system.Modules These modules are those we currently offer and may be subject to change.Year 1 (all compulsory)1. Health Assessment in Advancing Practice (20 Credits)2. Complex Clinical Reasoning (20 Credits)
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
